original: But the blue moon is not real
Anyway, hurry up and go back to find mom and dad.
zh_trans: 无论如何，快点回去找妈妈和爸爸。

original: I should have gone to the hospital, but not here
zh_trans: 我应该去医院，而不是这里

original: I'm pretty sure I was at a hospital...And when I came to, I was here...
zh_trans: 我很确定我之前在医院……然后我醒来，就在这里了……

original: Why are you in the hospital?
I saw someone... I saw someone die.
zh_trans: 我看到有人……我看到有人死了。

original: It happened right in front of me..
So, I was brought here for counseling..
zh_trans: 所以，我被带到这里来做心理咨询……

original: I wanna see my mom and dad...
zh_trans: 我想见我的妈妈和爸爸……

original: Wipe that stupid,smug look off your face!
zh_trans: 你能别摆个B脸给我看吗？

original: I'll give you a 3 second head start how far can you run?!
zh_trans: 我给你3秒时间，你能跑多远？！

original: show me the despair on your face! YES! MORE!
zh_trans: 让我看看你脸上的绝望！是的！更多！

original: I won't give you a second this time
zh_trans: 我不会给你第二次机会了

original: The final elevator will start in 25seconds
zh_trans: 最后的电梯将在25秒后启动

original: It's me. I'm your psychologist, Danny
zh_trans: 是我，你的心理医生，丹尼
是啊， 你不记得了吗

original: But don't worry. I'm really your doctor
zh_trans: 别担心，我真的是你的医生

original: *ray* Who is going to kill me?
I'm afraid the one who chased you is a murderer
zh_trans: 恐怕追你的人是一个杀人犯

original: *ray* Doctor, we need to run quickly
It doesn't matter. He can't get to this floor
zh_trans: 这不重要，他到不了这一层

original: Rachel, let's go find the exit
zh_trans: 瑞吉儿，我们一起去找出口吧

original: There are probably some rules here
*ray*Zack, wake up. I brought the medicine
zh_trans: *ray*扎克，快起来。我把药带过来了

original: *zack*Hey, ray, what's the reason you're trying so hard to help me
zh_trans: *zack*瑞吉儿，你为什么要这么努力的帮助我

original: *zack*Why are you saying such disgusting things
zh_trans: *zack*你为什么要说这么肉麻的话

original: Close the elevator door after 15 seconds
*gray*I'm the priest of this church, gray
*ray*I'm looking for something to stop the bleeding
*gray*Unfortunately, there is no medicine here that can be used for treatment
zh_trans: *gray*很不幸的是，这里没有可以用于止血的东西

original: *gray*But if you want to go, you must accept some small trials
zh_trans: *gray*但如果你想去的话，你必须接受一些小小的考验

original: *gray*I just want to know who you are
*ray*Zack is still waiting for me zack
The other door will open in 10 seconds
*ray*I have to hurry to save people now
The door will break in 15 seconds
*ray*A series of strange things on this floor are illusions
zh_trans: *ray*一大堆在这层的东西是幻觉

original: *ray*It was my God who woke me up
*gray*It seems that I failed to purify the witch
zh_trans: *gray*看起来我净化你这个魔女失败了

original: *gray*Well, the medicine is in the dark door next to the bookcase
zh_trans: *gray*好吧，药在书架旁边的暗门里面

original: *gray*A sad witch who only loves herself
zh_trans: *gray*一个伤心的只爱自己的魔女
*gray*接下来将会是魔女的旅途了

original: *gray*Now I doubt that you are a witch and deceived my angels
zh_trans: *gray*现在我觉得你是个魔女欺骗了我的天使们

original: *gray*Next, let's invite witness Cathy to present his testimony
zh_trans: *gray*现在我们有请证人凯西来阐述他的证词

original: *cathy*The woman standing here looks gentle and elegant
zh_trans: *cathy*这个站在这里的女人看起来温柔又优雅

original: *cathy*He is a witch worthy of the name
*gray*That's enough. You don't have the right to use punishment

zh_trans: *gray*艾迪，你可以证明她的罪行吗？
*eddie*但是瑞吉儿却不是这么想的

original: *eddie*You are so self willed and selfish
*eddie*Finally, I was killed by Zack and lay alone in the cemetery
zh_trans: *eddie*最终，我被扎克杀死，独自躺在坟墓里

original: *eddie*I asked for the use of needles against her
*danny*I have to talk about her charm
*danny*At that time, I was always looking for my ideal eyes
zh_trans: *danny*在那时，我一直在寻找我心仪的眼睛

original: *danny*Eyes that are still alive, but have died forever
zh_trans: *danny*那些活着，但却已经死了很久的眼睛

original: *danny*Her eyes are what I've been looking for
zh_trans: *danny*她的眼睛就是我一直在寻找的

original: *danny*There is no doubt that her heart is abnormal
zh_trans: *danny*毫无疑问，她的心理是不正常的

original: *danny*If it's about her charm, I can say it in more detail
zh_trans: *danny*如果是关于她的魅力，我还可以继续描述

original: *gray*That's enough. There's no need to listen any more
*gray*Rachel Gardner, your verdict has been reached
zh_trans: *gray*瑞吉儿,加德纳，你的判决已经决定了

original: The door will open in 15 seconds

zh_trans: ray*这里有一股甜甜的味道

original: ray*The sweet smell seems to have become stronger...
The door of repentance will open in 10 seconds
zh_trans: 忏悔之门将在10秒后开启

original: The door will open in 15 seconds
The mirror will break in 10 seconds
*ray*Sorry, all the medicine in Danny's floor is missing
*zack*Speaking of it, the bastard said he had medicine on him
zh_trans: *zack*讲到这个，那个混蛋说药在他身上

original: *zack*You don't have to worry about it
*zack*After sleeping so long, I can go
zh_trans: *zack*在睡了这么久之后，我可以出发了

original: *zack*Since there is no medicine, we can only go forward
zh_trans: *zack*既然没有药，我们就只能向前走了

original: *ray*Have you always lived in that room with a dagger
zh_trans: *ray*你是不是一直住在一个有匕首的房间

original: *zack*I won't go back anyway. Don't worry
*ray*Zack, stop walking and have a rest
*ray*I can walk alone. I'll find the medicine this time
zh_trans: *ray*我可以一个人走。我这次一定会找到药的

original: *zack*You'll die if you go like this
*zack*Do you still want to be killed by me
*zack*But you are so desperate for my life and death
*zack*What are you looking for from me
zh_trans: *zack*你到底在我身上寻觅着什么呢？

original: *zack*I'm going to sleep. Whatever you want
*ray*Zack, I must help you this time
*gray*Even if you stare at me like this, you can't see anything
zh_trans: *gray*就算你这么盯着我，你也看不到任何东西

original: *gray*I'd like to know what kind of existence you are that disrupts everything here
zh_trans: *gray*我想知道你究竟是什么样的存在，扰乱的这里的一切

original: *gray*If you bring bad influence, I must punish you
zh_trans: *gray*如果你带来的不幸，我必须惩罚你

original: *ray*It's not my problem. I'm going to find Zack
zh_trans: *ray*这不是我的错，我要去找扎克

original: *gray*Well, I'll make some preparations before I give you a judgment
zh_trans: *gray*在你的裁决来临之前，先让我做点准备

original: *ray*You're disgusting. Don't get in my way
*gray*Are you a poor lamb or a devil
zh_trans: 你是只可怜的小羊还是个恶魔呢

original: *ray*You said there was medicine on this floor
*gray*Didn't you think you caused all these unfortunate things
zh_trans: *gray*你不觉得是你造成了这些不幸的事物吗

original: *gray*Maybe there's a bandage in Zack's layer
zh_trans: *gray*没准在扎克的那层会有绷带

original: *ray*Yes, I want to go back quickly
*gray*Well, there are some things I care about
zh_trans: *gray*嗯，有些事情是我比较在意的

original: Close the elevator door after 20 seconds
Use Zack tag to open elevator doors
zh_trans: 用扎克的牌子打开电梯门

original: Zack has lost his reason now. Run
zh_trans: 扎克丧失了他的理智 快跑！

original: *cathy*It's hard for you to rush all the way here
*cathy*I'm really happy to see you two break up
zh_trans: *cathy*看到你俩决裂真是太开心了

original: *zack* Your expression makes me want to kill people very much
zh_trans: *zack* 你的表现让我十分想要杀人

original: *zack* It woke me up all at once
*cathy*What a surprise. I should praise you
*cathy*As a special service, I've opened the door
zh_trans: *cathy*作为一份特殊的礼物，我会开门

original: *zack*We're all out. Isn't that what you should do
zh_trans: *zack*我们都出去了，这难道不是你该做的吗

original: *cathy*By the way, Zack, I'll ask you again
zh_trans: *cathy*顺便说一句，扎克，我再问你一次

original: *cathy*You really don't want to stay in prison all your life?
zh_trans: *cathy*你真的不想在监狱里度过一辈子吗？

original: *cathy*Are you really not going to be my pastime prop?
zh_trans: 你真的不会成为我的玩物吗

original: *cathy*You two have a strange agreement, don't you
zh_trans: *cathy*你们俩之间是不是有些奇怪的约定？

original: *cathy*In fact, you just use each other
zh_trans: *cathy*实际上，你们只是在互相利用而已

original: *cathy*Forget it, look forward to the next punishment
*cathy*If you're so grumpy again, I won't let you out
zh_trans: *cathy*如果你的脾气还是这么火爆的话，我不会让你们出去的

original: *zack*I was in a trance just now
*zack*Want to kill, want to kill, want to kill
*ray*Zack, you swore to me. That's your oath. You're also my God
zh_trans: *ray*扎克，你向我保证过，这是你的誓言，你也是我的唯一

original: *cathy*If you don't want to die, listen carefully
zh_trans: *cathy*如果你不想死的话，就听仔细点

original: *cathy*Such a room is full of great things
zh_trans: *cathy*这么个房间充满着很棒的东西

original: *cathy*Try to escape within the time limit
zh_trans: *cathy*试着在时间结束前逃出去吧

original: *cathy*Or we'll send you powerful poison gas that none of you can save
zh_trans: *cathy*要不然我就会释放强力毒气让你们都无法存活

original: *ray*There seems to be something in the pipe
*cathy*But it's past the time limit, and you can't get out
zh_trans: *cathy*但这已经过了时限了，所以你们不能出去

original: *cathy*Now is the long-awaited performance time of special poison gas
zh_trans: *cathy*接下来就是期待已久的强力毒气咯

original: *ray*The agreement with Zack can't be realized if we don't go out alive
zh_trans: *ray*如果我们不能活着出去的话和扎克的约定就不能实现

original: Find a hiding place in 8 seconds to avoid the explosion
zh_trans: 找一个地方躲藏来避免爆炸

original: *zack*If you're afraid, how can you go forward
zh_trans: *zack*如果你怕了，你还怎么能够向前走呢

original: *ray*I think it's better to be cautious
*zack*I don't care. Find a way to get out of here
*zack*Finding a mechanism is the most tiring
need a player to sit in a chair
zh_trans: 需要一个玩家坐在椅子上

original: *cathy*Hello, please forgive me across the screen
*cathy*I am the owner of this floor
*cathy*How long can a monster last under my punishment
zh_trans: *cathy*你这个怪物在我的折磨下能坚持多久呢

original: *cathy*The eyes of the audience will fall on punishment
zh_trans: *cathy*观众的目光将会投在你们身上

original: *cathy*For the sake of Rachel's efforts, let you go here
zh_trans: *cathy*在瑞吉儿的坚持下，你可以走了

original: *zack*This smelly woman, I must kill her
zh_trans: *zack*这个臭女人，我一定要杀了她

original: *zack*Why do we have to take pictures
*ray*You can't go on without taking pictures
*zack*Didn't you agree to let us through
*cathy*Don't worry. You can prepare before you accept the punishment
zh_trans: *cathy*别担心，在你们接受惩罚前你们可以准备一会

original: *cathy*I'll open the necessary rooms for you
*cathy*There are many painful punishments waiting for you
zh_trans: *cathy*有很多痛苦的惩罚等待着你们

original: *zack*If only I could rise to the top in one breath
zh_trans: *zack*要是我能一口气爬上顶峰就好了

original: *ray*There is nothing else in this room
*zack*How can I understand something you don't even understand
zh_trans: *zack*我怎么能理解那些你都不理解的东西呢

original: *cathy*I'll teach you a lesson before I get forgiveness
zh_trans: *cathy*在我饶恕你们之前我先要教你们点东西

original: *cathy*And I am the one who has been given this right
zh_trans: *cathy*而我是被赋予这个权利的人

original: *eddie*It's dark, cool and comfortable to be buried in the soil
*eddie*I will keep you in a beautiful sarcophagus forever
zh_trans: *eddie*我会永远把你放在一个漂亮的石棺里

original: *eddie*Rachel, I wanted you to die beautiful
Be careful Eddie will attack you in the dark fog
zh_trans: 小心，Eddie会在浓雾中攻击你

original: Close the elevator door after 15 seconds
Rachel, let me realize your wish
zh_trans: 瑞吉儿，让我理解你的愿望

original: But I also have a wish
If you can, I hope you can rely on me
zh_trans: 如果可以的话，我希望你可以依靠我

original: Because it's beautiful to be happy with each other
zh_trans: 因为和对方快乐的在一起是很美好的

original: I know you very well. You want to die, don't you
zh_trans: 我很了解你，你想死，难道不是吗？

original: *eddie*I won't suddenly kill you like everyone else
zh_trans: *eddie*我不会像别人一样突然杀了你

original: *eddie*It doesn't matter. I know everything about you
*eddie*Don't say that. I'll make it easy for you to die
zh_trans: *eddie*别这么说，我会让你死得很轻松

original: *zack*Don't even think about getting killed so easily
*zack*There are many people in this building trying to kill you
zh_trans: *zack*这栋建筑里有很多人想要去杀了你

original: *zack*But it must be me who can kill you in the end
zh_trans: *zack*但最后杀死你的人只能是我

original: I am very suitable to realize your wish
zh_trans: 我非常适合实现你的愿望

original: *ray*The cause of death was shot and lost too much blood
zh_trans: *ray*死因是被射击多次失血而亡
*ray*你对这栋建筑了解得透彻吗

original: *zack*The specific situation is not very clear
*zack*Someone told me * you can kill whoever you want * so I came here
zh_trans: *zack*有人告诉我*谁都可以杀了你*所以我来这里了

original: *zack*Guys on other floors should be like this
zh_trans: *zack*其他楼层的人应该也这样吧

original: *zack*No wonder there's a smell of dirt
*zack*Why don't you give up this grave?
*zack*I don't want to die with you. Go and find an exit for me
zh_trans: *zack*我可不想和你一起死，去给我找个出口

original: *ray*Shall I go in and have a look?
*zack*You don't want to run away, do you
zh_trans: *zack*你不会是想着逃跑吧，是不是

original: *zack* Forget it, you go in and have a look
*ray* If you can, don't destroy my grave, okay?
zh_trans: *ray* 如果你可以的话，能不能不要把我坟墓给拆了

original: Rachel, I've cared about you a long time ago
zh_trans: 瑞吉儿，我从很早以前就开始关心你了

original: But that guy will get in the way
I fell in love with you at first sight
So I prepared a special gift for you
zh_trans: 所以说我为你准备了一份特别的礼物
一个可以永远长眠的地方

original: Find the right tombstone and break it
zh_trans: 找到正确的墓碑，破坏它

original: All humans go to the passage in the middle of the hall
zh_trans: 所有的人都走到大厅中间的通道

original: *zack* Why do you dare to run here carelessly
zh_trans: *zack* 你怎么敢这么不小心地跑来这里

original: *ray* I have a request . Kill me.. Please
*zack* If you have time to say such disgusting words
zh_trans: *zack* 如果你有时间说这么恶心的话

original: *zack* you might as well find a way to open this
zh_trans: *zack* 你还不如想办法打开这个

original: *ray* Just open this door and you'll kill me
zh_trans: *ray* 只要打开这扇门，你就会杀了我

original: *zack* As long as I can get out of here, I'll kill you
zh_trans: *zack* 只要我能离开这里，我就会杀了你

original: Rachel, can I take a closer look at your eyes
zh_trans: 瑞秋，我能仔细看看你的眼睛吗

original: But your eyes are full of fear
zh_trans: 但你的眼睛里充满了恐惧

original: Like a pair of ordinary eyes
I really want to see your really beautiful eyes
zh_trans: 我真的想看看你真正美丽的眼睛

original: If you can wake up from this nightmare
zh_trans: 如果你能从这个噩梦中醒来

original: Can you change back to those beautiful and silent eyes like the blue moon
zh_trans: 你能变回那双像蓝月亮一样美丽而沉默的眼睛吗

original: Rachel, I want to live by your eyes
zh_trans: 瑞秋，我想活在你的眼睛里

original: By the way, I left something important around here
zh_trans: 顺便说一下，我把一些重要的东西忘在这里了

original: Can you help me find it
Can you help me look in the room
zh_trans: 你能帮我在房间里找找吗

original: Let me give you a hint
Rachel, the room inside is dark. Be careful
zh_trans: 瑞秋，里面房间很暗。小心

original: Looking at this, you still can't remember anything?
zh_trans: 看着这个，你还是什么都想不起来吗？

original: I'm going to put this on now
Can you wait for me in the opposite room?
zh_trans: 你能在对面的房间等我吗？

original: *ray* That's strange. This is not the doctor I know. I have to run away
zh_trans: *ray* 真奇怪。这不是我认识的医生。我得跑了
我不是说过不能逃跑吗

original: Then meet your parents in hell
zh_trans: 然后在地狱里见你的父母

original: Looks like you're still in a dream
You helped me find it. Thank you
zh_trans: 你帮我找到了它。谢谢你

original: *ray* Is this artificial eye a doctor's?
*zack* Danny, why are you shouting so happy
zh_trans: *zack* 丹尼，你为什么这么高兴地大喊大叫

original: *zack* This will make me want to cut you
*zack* Running after you here seems to be making a big deal
zh_trans: *zack* 在这里追你好像是在小题大做

original: *zack* Run for your life and I'll kill you with a knife
zh_trans: *zack* 逃命吧，不然我就用刀杀了你

original: *zack* I'm not interested in shredding dolls
zh_trans: *zack* 我对撕扯玩偶不感兴趣

original: For violating the rules, the Betrayer was regarded as a sacrifice
zh_trans: 因为违反了规则，叛徒被视为牺牲品

original: *zack* Are you kidding? I'd better run away
zh_trans: *zack* 你在开玩笑吧？我最好还是逃跑吧

original: There are probably some rules here

zh_trans: 每个人的愿望都不同，对吧？
只想要一双漂亮的眼睛

original: Because there's something wrong with one of my eyes
zh_trans: 因为我的一只眼睛有问题

original: If eyes like you were mine
zh_trans: 如果我有像你一样的眼睛

original: Let's go and have a look in another room
zh_trans: 我们去另一个房间看看吧

original: Rachel, let's go find the exit
zh_trans: 瑞吉儿，我们一起去找出口吧

original: It doesn't matter. He can't get to this floor
zh_trans: 这不重要，他到不了这一层

original: *ray* Doctor, we need to run quickly
I'm afraid the one who chased you is a murderer
zh_trans: 恐怕追你的人是一个杀人犯

original: *ray* Who is going to kill me?
But don't worry. I'm really your doctor
zh_trans: 别担心，我真的是你的医生
是啊， 你不记得了吗

original: It's me. I'm your psychologist, Danny
zh_trans: 是我，你的心理医生，丹尼

original: I won't give you a second this time
zh_trans: 我不会给你第二次机会了

original: The final elevator will start in 25seconds
zh_trans: 最后的电梯将在25秒后启动
因B6的层主攻击了B5的层主
